bilingual.source: Online English-learning forums can be a very useful learning resource.
bilingual.target: 在线英语学习论坛可以是非常有用的学习资源。

bilingual.source: Why do you think children are the world's most valuable resource?
bilingual.target: 你为什么认为孩子是世界上最宝贵的资源？

bilingual.source: Children are the world's most valuable resource and its best hope.
bilingual.target: 孩子是世界上最宝贵的资源和最好的希望。

bilingual.source: The teacher's resource pack is an invaluable source of material for teachers.
bilingual.target: 教师资源包是教师宝贵的资料来源。

bilingual.source: Water conservation is important because clean water is a limited resource.
bilingual.target: 节约用水很重要，因为清洁水是有限的资源。
时间是我们最珍贵的资源。
煤炭是重要的能源资源。

bilingual.source: This book is a great learning resource.
bilingual.target: 这本书是一个很好的学习资源。
石油是一种重要的能源资源。

list.abstract: Resource — 资源 在逻辑上与应用程序一起部署的任何不可执行的数据。资源可以在应用程序中作为错误信息显示，或者作为用户界面的一部分显示。资源可以包含多种形式的数据，包括字符串、图像和持久的对象等。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, really one resource in particular. One unique to our planet. Us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，确切的说是一种特别的资源，地球特有的。我们。

yingyinNormal.en: Now the human beings on your planet are merely a resource waiting to be converted into capital.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在你星球上的人类仅仅是等待转换成资本的资源而已。

yingyinNormal.en: The South China Sea is a natural resource being used to sustain the growing millions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中国南海就是一处用于维持日益增长的万千民众之生计的自然资源。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Cooper's right. We need to think of time as a resource, like oxygen and food. Going down will cost us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，Cooper是对的，我们得把时间也当成一种资源，就像氧气和食物，下去是有代价的。

yingyinNormal.en: But when you have access to the vastness of space, you realize there's only one resource worth fighting over, even killing for, more time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你真正进入宇宙空间就会意识到，只有一种资源值得你为他而战，甚至大开杀戒——获得永生。

yingyinNormal.en: Over the next week, artists will race to transform this plentiful local resource into a giant frozen wonderland, the Harbin ice and snow festival.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个下一周，艺术家将竞相把这丰富的本地资源转化为巨大无匹的冰雪仙境：哈尔滨冰雪节。

yingyinNormal.en: Coal, this one critical resource supplies nearly half of America's electricity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 煤，这至关重要的能源，维持着近一半美国人的用电需求。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a high-tech treasure map for America's fastest-growing renewable resource, wind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是给美国快速发展的可再生能源提供的高科技宝藏地图，风能。

yingyinNormal.en: These cows produce an energy resource that you don't have to dig, drill, ship, or pipe in. But a shovel does come in handy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些奶牛产生一种无需挖洞，钻孔，装船，输送的能源但要用到铁铲。

yingyinNormal.en: But after the US abolished this system in 1971, the dollar became what is known as fiat money, meaning not linked to any external resource,
yingyinNormal.zh: 但1971年美国舍弃这套制度后，美金就成了所谓的法定货币也就是不与任何外在商品挂钩，

yingyinNormal.en: But after the US abolished this system in 1971, the dollar became what is known as fiat money, meaning not linked to any external resource.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但1971年美国舍弃这套制度后，美金就成了所谓的法定货币也就是不与任何外在商品挂钩，

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: What matters is that they will belong to a private monopoly which developed them using public <highlight>resources</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重要的是，它们将属于利用公共资源发展自己的私人垄断企业。

examination_example.sentence: The TSA cannot continue diverting <highlight>resources</highlight> into underused PreCheck lanes while most of the traveling public suffers in unnecessary lines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: TSA不能继续在未充分利用的“PreCheck”通道上浪费资源，而让大多数出行的公众忍受不必要的排队时间。

examination_example.sentence: Students are usually to blame for their lack of <highlight>resources</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生通常因缺乏资源而受到责备。

sense_info_list.en: one's personal attributes and capabilities regarded as able to help or sustain one in adverse circumstances
an action or strategy which may be adopted in adverse circumstances

指源泉，一般是源源不断地产生。
指一个东西的来源、出处，是一次性的。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: This is especially important for under-<highlight>resourced</highlight> schools and communities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对资源不足的学校和社区尤为重要。

examination_example.sentence: As my colleague Van Newark reported, Putterer Rico is still confronting economic and structural destruction and <highlight>resource</highlight> scarcity from 2017's Hurricane Maria.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如我的同事范恩·纽柯克所报道的那样，波多黎各仍然面临着2017年飓风玛丽亚带来的经济和结构性破坏以及资源短缺问题。

examination_example.sentence: Textbook publishers connect professors, instructors and students in ways that alternatives, such as open e-textbooks and open educational <highlight>resources</highlight>, simply do not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教科书出版商将教授、教师和学生联系在一起，这是其他替代性选择(如开放式电子教科书和开放式教育资源)根本无法做到的。

sense_info_list.en: an action or strategy which may be adopted in adverse circumstances

examination_example.sentence: They felt like they had the <highlight>resources</highlight> to deal with the demanding situation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们觉得自己有足够的资源来应对这种严峻的形势。

examination_example.sentence: They lack the necessary <highlight>resources</highlight> to address pupils' mental problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们缺乏必要的资源来解决学生的心理问题。

sense_info_list.en: one's personal attributes and capabilities regarded as able to help or sustain one in adverse circumstances

examination_example.sentence: Develop students' creative skills with the <highlight>resources</highlight> available.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 利用现有的才智培养学生的创造技能。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: Unfortunately, it took the explorers and the settlers who followed only a few decades to decimate a large part of these <highlight>resources</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不幸的是，仅仅几十年后，探险家和定居者就毁灭了这些资源的很大一部分。

examination_example.sentence: Hunters willingly pay the stamp price to ensure the survival of our natural <highlight>resources</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 狩猎者都愿意支付印花税，以确保我们的自然资源能够维持下去。

examination_example.sentence: Native Americans had taken care of these precious natural <highlight>resources</highlight> wisely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 印第安人明智地保护了这些宝贵的自然资源。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It’s the best way to protect our world’s most valuable natural <highlight>resource</highlight> (资源).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是保护我们世界上最宝贵的自然资源的最佳方式。

examination_example.sentence: It includes <highlight>resource</highlight> protection and green development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它包括资源保护和绿色发展。
